title: Stuck at 33% while updating
body: So my league client stopped at 33% when I was updating. I guess my internet went out while it was updating and every time I close out of league and open it back up the update starts back up again at 33%. Is there any fix to this?

replies.body:
Getting stuck at 33% during patching signifies that there's an issue with your patching properly grabbing files from the patching servers. This is typically induced by specific network configurations that conflict with League, so I'd recommend working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to address this.

Let me know if this resolved your issue.
Question, would downloading and using the Hextech Repair Tool fix this issue? I would try this out myself but i'm downloading something on my PC right now :T

It's possible, since the Hextech Repair Tool automates some networking changes that we suggest, like running a public DNS or adding exceptions in your Firewall. I'm more concerned about having you try *all* the steps in the connection guide.

Let me know how it goes.
